DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy bimatoprost 0.01 % subject elevate intraocular pressure ( IOP ) due primary open-angle glaucoma ( POAG ) ocular hypertension ( OH ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Efficacy Study Bimatoprost 0.01 % Primary Open-Angle Glaucoma ( POAG ) Ocular Hypertension ( OH )
DOC.criteria: Elevated IOP due either primary openangle glaucoma ocular hypertension
